    • Uses of Block in Model.PowerUps

      Subclasses of Block in Model.PowerUps 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bombpass
      This class enables the bomberman to go through bombs
      class  Detonator
      This class gives an ability to detonate bombs to the bomberman

      This class gives an immunity to the bomberman

      This class increases the speed of the bomberman
      class  UpBombs
      This class increases the amount of the bombs the bomberman possesses
      class  Wallpass
      This class enables the bomberman to go through any brick wall
